title: Cheese and Hashbrown Hamburger Casserole
directions: Step 1 - Heat the Olive oil in a skillet
Step 2 - Add the onion to the oil and cook until they are translucent
Step 3 - Add the ground beef to the onion and brown completely
Step 4 - Mix the hashbrowns, cream of mushroom soup, milk and 1 cup of shredded cheese into the ground beef and mix together
Step 5 - Place the mixture into a baking dish and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes
Step 6 - Add the last ½ cup of shredded cheese to the top of the casserole for the last 10 minutes of baking. Enjoy!
ingredients: 4 Cups Frozen Hashbrowns, shredded or cubed
